game_description: Let the fun begins: Put your handset and play "jogging". - Great music. - Gorgeous views. - Fun challenges : hit balls, jumping, laser shooting, frisbee throwing and more. - Single player or multiplayer.
review_1: This game is amazing and It's the most fun way of exercising. In the future I'd prefer for there to be more scenes, but still a lot of fun!
review_2: This game is awesome! is super fun and it boosts your energy & I love the different levels.
